main event: Radar contact with an unidentified object that appeared as a greenish blob and 'flash' on the surface of the sea.
interesting points: The unidentified object was observed for approximately 2-3 minutes before fading from view.
The object appeared as a luminous trail on the surface of the sea, approximately 10,000 yards long and 30-40 yards wide.
The color of the object was described as white/bluish green and had no definable shape.
The weather in the area was clear with good visibility at the time of the sighting.
The sighting was reported to the USAF Liaison Officer upon arrival at the destination.
sighted object: luminous trail on the surface of the sea
